name: The Meanings [Early Access]
description:
Academics and law enforcement agents vie for control of a demon-haunted, monster-infested island in this new TTRPG from Jeremy P. Bushnell, the author of The Weirdness, The Insides, and Relentless Melt. Art by Edith Rothwell.

Sourcebook is at 35,000 words, an early access version of it for playtesters will be uploaded soon.

Hex tiles for wilderness adventures around the island are complete and will be posted soon.
